Title: Klick
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Heather Marion, Vince Gilligan, Ann Cherkis (executive story editor), Gordon Smith (story editor)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Jimmy must make a hard choice; Mike takes control of matters; Hamlin delivers shocking news.
